scripts.lint: cd browser-extension && npm run lint && cd ../mobile-app && npm run lint
scripts.lint:fix: cd browser-extension && npm run lint:fix && cd ../mobile-app && npm run lint:fix
scripts.format: cd browser-extension && npm run format && cd ../mobile-app && npm run format
scripts.format:check: cd browser-extension && npm run format:check && cd ../mobile-app && npm run format:check
